pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:3.1.16: “A formal meeting of the community”, _saṁvāsa_, is defined at [pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:2.1.21](), as the observance day ceremony, the invitation ceremony, or a legal procedure.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:3.3.5: That _osāreti_ must mean “recite” can be seen from [pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:2.3.5]() where there is no offense if _osārentaṁ opāteti_, “he prompts one who is _osārentaṁ_.” The difference between _uddesaṁ deti_ and _osāreti_ is not clear to me.
